Reception.description: A dusty reception area with torn wallpaper. An old desk sits in the corner.

Office.description: A dark office with papers scattered everywhere. A broken window lets in a cold breeze.

Storage.description: A cramped storage room filled with shelves and boxes. The air is stale.

Badge.textResponse: An employee ID badge for 'John Smith - Security'
Badge.actionResponse: You clip the badge to your shirt.

Plant.textResponse: A withered potted plant. It looks like it hasn't been watered in months.

Laptop.textResponse: An old laptop covered in dust. The screen is cracked but it might still work.
Laptop.actionResponse: The laptop powers on briefly before dying. The battery is dead.

Papers.textResponse: Scattered documents about some kind of research project. Most are too faded to read.

Flashlight.textResponse: A heavy-duty flashlight. It still has some battery life.
Flashlight.actionResponse: You turn on the flashlight, illuminating the dark corners of the room.

initialMessage: You find yourself in an abandoned office building. The main lights are out and there's an eerie silence. Maybe you can find some clues about what happened here.
